 Promotion for new PFC subscribers in M ay , 2014 1. Eligibility: New PFC starter kits ( VND0 starter kits ) which are activated and first loaded from 13th - 30th May , 2014 . New PFC starter kits ( M0 ) which are activated and loaded from 13th - 30th May , 2014 . PFC starter kits activated from 13th - 30th May , 2014 . and issued before 30 th April , 2014 remaining at Mobifone's agencies/stores that have the main balance of more than VND0 after deducting the subscription fee. 2. Content: a. Top up promotion : Promotion for the first top-up during the promotion period after successful activation. NOT eligible for PFC starter kit (M0) Top-up value Bonus data added in Data1 credit Days of data use VND5.000 25 MB According to the days of use of the main credit VND10.000 50 MB VND20.000 100 MB VND30.000 150 MB VND50.000 250 MB VND100.000 500 MB VND200.000 1 GB VND300.000 1.5 GB VND500.000 2.4GB b. Periodically promotion : Bonus 6GB into KMDT credit after activation and added for 12 times 500MB/30 days into Data3. Regulations for bonus 1 st time : adding on the day after activation . 2th -12th time: cycle n+30 (n is the evaluation day of the last month ). Eligibility : top-up at least VND 10.000 within the previous 30 days . if not eligible, that bonus will not be reserved. Remaining Data in Data3 acoount if not used, will be added to the next cycle as long as: there is credit used in the main balance for at least VND 10,000 in the previous 30 days. c. Encouraging bonus : Every VND10.000 used in the main balance, will get 50MB/30 days to Data2 Evaluation and addition time: same as periodically bonus evaluation time Total additional data = ( Credit used in main balance/ 10.000)*50MB ( Credit used in main balance /10.000) will be rounded up . Ex: : ( Credit used in main balance /10.000) = 7,8 => 7 Remaining data in Data2 will not be reserved for the next cycle. d. Other terms and conditions are as same as PFC regulations . &#12288; 3. T ime : From 13 to 30 May, 2014 2014&#24180;0 5 &#26376; &#26032; &#21457;&#23637; PFC &#21495;&#30721;&#20248;&#24800;&#27963;&#21160; 1.&#23545;&#35937;&#65306; PFC&#21495;&#30721; &#20837;&#32593;&#22871;&#39184; 13/5 - 30/5/2014 &#44032;&#51077;&#46108; PFC &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#51060;&#44256; &#46608;&#45716; &#44032;&#51077;&#48708;&#50857;&#51012; &#44277;&#51228;&#46108; &#54980;&#50640; &#51452;&#44228;&#51221;&#51008; &#51201;&#50857;&#46108; &#44592;&#44036;&#50640;&#45716; &#44032;&#51077;&#54620; &#54980;&#50640; &#52395;&#48264;&#51704; &#52649;&#51204;&#54620;&#45796; . PFC (M0) &#51201;&#50857; &#50504; &#46108;&#45796; &#52649;&#51204;&#52852;&#46300;&#51032; &#50529;&#47732;&#44032;&#44201; PFC&#51032; &#45936;&#51060;&#53552; &#44228;&#51221; 1&#50640; &#47924;&#47308;&#51228;&#44277;&#50857;&#47049; &#45936;&#51060;&#53552;&#47484; &#51060;&#50857;&#44592;&#44036; 5.000 25 MB &#51452;&#44228;&#51221;&#50640; &#46384;&#46972; &#51060;&#50857;&#44592;&#44036; 10.000 50 MB 20.000 100 MB 30.000 150 MB 50.000 250 MB 100.000 500 MB 200.000 1 GB 300.000 1.5 GB 500.000 2.4GB b. &#51221;&#44592;: &#44060;&#53685; &#54980;&#50640; &#51221;&#44592; &#45936;&#50640;&#53552; &#44228;&#51221;&#50640;&#49436; 6GB&#47484; &#52628;&#44032;&#46104;&#44256; Data 3 &#44228;&#51221;&#50640;&#49436; 30&#51068;&#45817; 500MB &#47484; &#52628;&#44032; &#46112; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; (&#47784;&#46160; 12&#48264;&#50640; &#52628;&#44032;&#46108;&#45796;). &#47924;&#47308;&#51228;&#44277; &#45936;&#51060;&#53552;&#47049;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#44592;&#44036;: 13/05/2014 &#48512;&#53552; 30/05/2014 &#44620;&#51648; PFC &#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034;&#6032;&#6098;&#6040;&#6072; &#6017;&#6082; 5/2014 1. &#6047;&#6040;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6102;​ &#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040;&#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034; PFC (BHM 0đ) &#6026;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6016;&#6070;&#6031;&#6016;&#6084;&#6047;&#6026;&#6086;&#6036;&#6076;&#6020;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6038;&#6072;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 13/5 - 30/5/2014&#6100; &#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040;&#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034; PFC (M0) &#6026;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6038;&#6072;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 13/5 - 30/5/2014 &#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040;&#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034; PFC &#6026;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070; &#6038; &#6072;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 13/5 - 30/5/2014 &#6021;&#6081;&#6025;&#6040;&#6075;&#6035;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 30/4/2014 &#6016;&#6086;&#6038;&#6075;&#6020; &#6040;&#6070;&#6035;​ &#6047;&#6043;&#6091; &#6031;&#6070;&#6040; &#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6026;&#6070;&#6026;&#6081;&#6036;&#6089;&#6076;/&#6016;&#6035;&#6098;&#6043;&#6082;&#6020; &#6043;&#6016;&#6091;&#6042;&#6070;&#6041; &#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6084;&#6041;&#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6026;&#6016;&#6033;&#6073;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035; &#6018;&#6030;&#6035;&#6072;&#6018;&#6084;&#6043; > 0đ &#6100; 2. &#6016;&#6086;&#6042;&#6071;&#6031;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6102; a. &#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6016;&#6070;&#6031;&#6016;&#6084;&#6047; 13/5 - 30/5/2014 &#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6084;&#6041;&#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6026;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6081;&#6021; &#6100; &#6040;&#6071;&#6035; &#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040; PFC (M0) &#6031;&#6086;&#6043;&#6083;&#6033;&#6073;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043; &#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6016;&#6086;&#6042;&#6071;&#6031;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6018;&#6030;&#6035;&#6072; Data1 &#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091; &#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6102; &#6023;&#6070;&#6040;&#6077;&#6041; 10.000đ &#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6026;&#6016;&#6038;&#6072;&#6018;&#6030;&#6035;&#6072;&#6018;&#6084;&#6043;, &#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6036;&#6076;&#6016; = ( &#6047;&#6042;&#6075;&#6036;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6026;&#6016;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6018;&#6030;&#6035;&#6072;&#6018;&#6084;&#6043; ( TKC ) /10.000)*50MB ( &#6047;&#6042;&#6075;&#6036;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6026;&#6016;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6018;&#6030;&#6035;&#6072;&#6018;&#6084;&#6043; ( TKC ) /10.000) &#6035;&#6073;&#6020;&#6034;&#6098;&#6044;&#6078;&#6031;&#6070;&#6040;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6016;&#6086;&#6030;&#6031;&#6091;&#6100; &#6055;&#6033;&#6070;&#6048;&#6042;&#6030;&#6093;&#6102; ( &#6047;&#6042;&#6075;&#6036;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6026;&#6016;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6018;&#6030;&#6035;&#6072;&#6018;&#6084;&#6043; ( TKC ) /10.000) = 7,8 => 7 &#6021;&#6086;&#6035;&#6077;&#6035;
